movies.title: Intimatta
movies.plot: Is a documentary based on video archives shots by Ramuntcho Matta of his father from the 1986 to 2000. Dozens of tapes of his father working, talking, walking and even sleeping, notebooks, letters, postcards and gifts; The diversity of sources and formats and voice records are undoubtedly a crucial contribution to the richness and appeal of this film revealing the secrets between a father and a son, when he first arrives in Europe, his life in Spain and France, the constant link with the architecture, his relationships with personalities of 20th century's art (Le Corbusier, Duchamp, Breton, etc.), the surrealist movement, his works, evolution of his painting, the birth of Abstract Expressionism, his political commitment, etc. 'INTIMATTA' crosses from 'Artist Matta' to 'Intimate Matta'.
